title: Apple Music faces second outage in two days, currently down for many users [U: Fixed]
content:
Users of Apple’s services on Monday experienced several issues as the company’s servers were completely down for a few hours. After just one day, Apple Music is currently down for several users around the world.

more…

The post Apple Music faces second outage in two days, currently down for many users [U: Fixed] appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: A day after a major outage on Apple's servers that affected multiple services, Apple Music is currently down for users around the world.
